title: Bombers
overview: A tragic bus accident kills all players of the Bombers club except one. Manik Dasgupta, a minister, moves for the kill by taking over the club's grounds and commissioning a shopping mall in its place. The only way for Bombers FC to stop Manik is to rebuild the team from scratch. Explore the story of Bombers, a Bengali football team, fighting death and oblivion.
